Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments

Correspondence of Laetitia Manchester, editorial and publicity assistant. Topics include story pitches, photography of School events, requests for subscriptions to School publications, and some administrative business. Most correspondence is with media outlets, or colleagues from other schools on their editorial work. Also some correspondence of Celeste Muschel, public relations.
